title: Feature Request: Add transaction hash a contract was deployed in to JSON artifacts

body:
Hmm, looks like I didn't respond to this after changing the title. Instead of the block number, we should add the transaction id as that can be used to find more information than simply the block itself.

Key should be `transactionId`, value is the 0x-prefixed transaction hash.

Will require changes to `truffle-contract-schema`.

__This issue now has a funding of 1.25 ETH (409.96 USDT) attached to it.__  To view or claim this funding, [click here](https://gitcoin.co/funding/details?url=https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/issues/472).

https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle-contract/pull/76
https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle-deployer/pull/14
https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle-contract-schema/pull/19

Testing locally, the transaction ID of the transaction that deployed the contract is now in Contract.json

@stevejaxon @tcoulter lmk what you think of the above ‚òùÔ∏è 

@kingcocomango great to have you!
defer to @stevejaxon on this.  im just here to facilitate the bounty!

As far as I can tell, the schema needs to be valid JSON, and since `$ref`s are an object they can't be used as a key. I pulled it out into a property for now though; and bumped the schema version. Should I post more test samples?

hey @tcoulter -- @stevejaxon did you see @kingcocomango 's comment above?  

was going through the active gitcoin.co bounties and just wanted to make sure everyone had what they needed here.  lmk!
just checking in here folks.  let me know if/when youll have time to check on this :)

@kingcocomango Thanks for the work digging around finding everything that needed to be updated for this. Made some small comments on your PRs; if you make those fixes I'll merge and get it released. Appreciate it!
@gnidan Changes done as per comments, travis is doing its thing :)
@gnidan just making sure u saw this ^^
just asked about this on consensys slack.
One more change request @kingcocomango, otherwise looks good. I'll merge once Travis is green and that last change is made. Thank you!
ping me when u make that change @kingcocomango -- thanks!
@owocki @kingcocomango Checking in - did the loop close here? I'm new to the Gitcoin squad joining Kevin, Happy New Year everyone!
@kingcocomango @gnidan @owocki Almost at the finish line here üôÇ  any update, friends?

Hello, sorry I was gone for a while.

I made the changes regarding naming and tested it locally, with mocha and a mock project and both run fine. Travis is however throwing an error that I have no idea how I could be causing. The same command passes locally.

https://gist.github.com/kingcocomango/5ac526ad29a97dd70ac557964d513c43 the status of the various repos locally, if it helps.
@kingcocomango Thanks for the update. @gnidan Does this get us over the finish line?
@vs77bb @owocki this is good to go! could you please issue @kingcocomango the bounty? thanks!
sorry for the slow response @gnidan -- ETHDenver ate my inbox.  paying out now ( https://etherscan.io/tx/0xd7d9d4931627d9cfdb49eeacd97a117cb8bd3b7f672ddbbcf8d81995452a2c62 )
Closing for housekeeping
